lesson.title_and_level: Upper-Intermediate - An Anonymous Tip in Jizhou

sentence.idiomatic: I can take working eight hours in a day, but more than eight hours I definitely can't take.
Your health was already poor; can you take working overtime every day?
Your wife really spends a lot of money, can you take it?
Yesterday a lot of headway was made in that case.
You must tell me when any new progress is made in your research.
It looks as if the feelings between the two of you have blossomed quite well.
They are a group of very unsophisticated peasants--they aren't scheming anything.
In that small town the customs are simple, and they are very friendly to everyone.
His simple kindness profoundly attracted me.
Hold on to my shoulder and we'll jump together.
There are a lot of people here. Hold on tightly to me, otherwise you'll lose your way.
Hold on to her, don't let her run away.
When I need him--that's when he is never around.
There are so many people after you, how could you fall in love with this nerd?
I don't know the answer to that question, however that was the one question that was on the test.
Oh no! I've been tricked. They banded together to haze me.
You just have to set up a sexual trap, and he will definitely be taken in.
I've seen this kind of little trick before, and I will not be taken in.
Be a little more honest, and stop playing tricks right in front of me.
I saw through these tricks meant to fool people right from the start.
What tricks are you playing, anyway?
Zhao Lu, you're still not looking too well. If we keep looking for Jianming today, can your health take it?
I'm fine.
If we look for him the same way we did yesterday, we might not make any headway. Today let's try going to the Kongluo people.
Can they understand Chinese?

If you keep it simple they can. Plus they are honest people, they should be willing to help us. (Telephone rings) Hello? Oh, I see. I'll be right there. Zhao Lu, I have news about Jianming. Come on, let's go look for him right now.
Was that what the person said on the phone? Who is he? How does he know Jianming?
Don't ask. There's no time!
If you don't tell me I won't go.
Whatever you want!

word.literal: to get out of the way
to get out of the way

sentence.idiomatic: All right, get on the bike. Hold on tight, I'm going to drive really fast. How come just at a time like this they are herding sheep? (Horn blast) Hey, make way! Make way! You want to die or something?
How much farther?
We're almost there. Ah, they finally left. Hang on! We're here, this should be it.
Jianming is in this house? Jianming! Jianming!
It's empty. How come there isn't anyone here? (Sniffing sound) Huh? There's a burning smell. Someone was definitely staying here.
Then Jianming must be in the area. I'm going out to look for him!
Just now--that Kongluo person herding sheep must have done that on purpose! Darn it, we fell into his trap!
If we go look for Jianming now there's still time!
It's no use. He's definitely already long gone.
Enough! I've had enough! Xu Wentao, who are you anyway? What kind of trick are you playing?
Zhao Lu, calm down a little.
Don't come near me. Don't come any closer! Oh my, what kind of place have I come to, anyway?
